text: 3:4 Filipai 3:19; 2 Pita 2:13; Jut 1:4; 1:19Egh me pazɨ uan namakabar amuam. Egh me deraghvɨra nɨghnighan kogh, atamra uan nɨghnɨzir kurabar gɨn mangam. Egh me uarira uarigh nɨghnɨgh suam, erara gumazir ekiaba, e bar pɨn iti. Egh me uan inivafɨzir agorogebar gɨn mangɨsɨ, God gifueghan kogham.
